name: Pramatra Space
description:
Pramatra Space is a quantum technology venture on a mission to make enterprises quantum resilient. We are building satellites to distribute quantum keys to enterprises using quantum entanglement. Our hardware systems and software platforms will offer solutions to clients to help protect and shield their data and digital assets. 

Pramatra Space is on the mission to prepare the world for Q-Day!
one_liner:

location: New York City, New York, United States
